content.text: I'm a little sad right now, my husband just decided to leave me.
I'm so sorry to hear that, I can imagine that's really hard.
Thank you, I'm trying to stay positive.
That's good, I know you'll get through this.
I hope so, I'm not sure what the future holds.
It's okay to not know what the future holds, just take it one day at a time.
I think I need to find a new hobby, to help keep my mind off of things.
That's a great idea, what are you interested in?
I love to read, I'm really into Jane Austen's books.
I love Jane Austen too, she's one of my favorite authors.
I also like to make clay sculptures, I'm trying to raise awareness about animal welfare issues.
That's so cool, I've always wanted to try making clay sculptures.
It's really fun, and it's a great way to express yourself.
I'm sure I'd be terrible at it, but it's something I've always wanted to try.
You should definitely give it a try, I'm sure you'd be great at it.
I might just have to do that, thanks for the suggestion.
You're welcome, I'm glad I could help
